General.Name: Dabaco
General.Description: Dabaco Group Joint Stock Company produces and sells animal feed in Vietnam. The company primarily offers feed for pigs, chicken feed, and aquatic feed under the Dabaco, Topfeeds, Kinh Bac, Khangti Vina, Nasaco, and Growfeeds names. It is also involved in the pig and chicken breeding activities; operation of pig and chicken contracted farms; provision of chicken meat; and production of sausages, jumpons, cans, and pies. In addition, the company invests in industrial zones, urban zone facilities, and infrastructure and real estate properties. Dabaco Group Joint Stock Company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in B"c Ninh, Vietnam.
